HELLOKOL

NFT Pass

Say Hello To Your NFT Pass!


HelloKOL Pass is a collection of 500 NFTs with unique numbers.


All members can share their ambitions and envision the future crypto and metaverse world as a pioneer.

HelloKOL Pass grants holders the privilege to access the HelloKOL Token.

You will also be a stakeholder in the metaverse to decide the future development of the metaverse community. Online or offline parties will be held for all members to interact.

Mint Your NFT Pass Now!

Benefits

1 NFT Holder
  • Become a VIP member of HelloKOL
  • Whitelisted for Feature 1, Feature 2, and so on ..
  • Exclusive contents
  • Exclusive live seminars
  • Private Discord chat room
  • Priority to public events
2 NFTs Holder
  • Access to the giveaway of future NFT/token/whatever we’re offering in the future
  • Physical gift
  • Free mint on future NFT/token/etc
3 NFTs Holder
  • 20% of royalties on the secondary market be rewarded back
  • Become DAO council members with weighting voting rights

Community

The blockchain brings the decentralization and community around new digital initiatives, and we have the vision to keep it that way. That’s why we decided to split the revenue made with the fashion industry directly with our community and core holders. The money earned will be given to our holders in terms of tokens, exclusive branded NFT drops, and physical merch drops from all our fashion partners.
